abilities.name: Impetus
abilities.description: Enchantress fills her spears with magical energy that deals additional damage based on the distance between her and her target.
abilities.notes: Damage is calculated based on distance traveled by the projectile. Deals pure damage that pierces spell immunity.

abilities.name: Enchant
abilities.description: Takes control of a creep. If cast on an enemy hero, slows their movement speed.
abilities.notes: Cannot dominate ancient creeps. Dominated creeps receive bonus health and damage.

abilities.name: Nature's Attendants
abilities.description: Summons wisps that heal Enchantress or nearby allied units. The healing is spread among all affected units.
abilities.notes: Heals all allied units within range including creeps and dominated units.

abilities.name: Untouchable
abilities.description: Enchantress's natural grace causes enemies who attack her to have their attack speed significantly reduced for a short duration.
abilities.notes: Attack speed reduction triggers when an enemy initiates an attack against Enchantress, not when the attack lands.

innate_abilities.name: Rabble-Rouser
innate_abilities.description: All neutral creeps conditionally deals more damage to enemy heroes.
innate_abilities.notes: Enhances damage dealt by dominated creeps against enemy heroes.
